mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESTAURANT(RNO, RNAME, ADDRESS) VALUES(SEQ_RES.NEXTVAL, #{rNameParam}, #{addressParam})
INSERT INTO POST(PNO, RNO, MEMBER_ID, PCONTENT, STAR) VALUES(SEQ_POST.NEXTVAL, #{rNo}, #{member_Id}, #{pContent}, #{star})
INSERT INTO PICTURE(PICTURE_NO, PNO, PORIGINNAME, PRENAMEDNAME, PLEVEL, UPLOADDATE, PICTURE_STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_PICTURE.NEXTVAL, #{pNo}, #{pOriginName}, #{pRenamedName}, #{pLevel}, SYSDATE, default)
mapper.select: SELECT PO.*, PI.PRENAMEDNAME, R.RNAME, R.ADDRESS FROM (SELECT P.*, M.MPHOTO, M.NICKNAME FROM POST P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID) WHERE P.PSTATUS='Y' ORDER BY PNO DESC) PO JOIN PICTURE PI ON(PO.PNO = PI.PNO) JOIN RESTAURANT R ON(PO.RNO = R.RNO) WHERE PI.PLEVEL = 0
SELECT P.*, M.NICKNAME, R.ADDRESS, R.RNAME FROM POST P JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_ID=P.MEMBER_ID) JOIN RESTAURANT R ON(R.RNO = P.RNO) WHERE P.PNO=#{pNo} AND P.PSTATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET PCNT = NVL(PCNT, 0) + 1 WHERE PNO = #{pNo}
mapper.select: SELECT PC.*, M.NICKNAME, M.MPHOTO, LEVEL FROM POST_COMMENT PC JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_ID = PC.CWRITER) WHERE PC.PNO= #{pNo} AND PC.CSTATUS = 'Y' START WITH PARENTKEY IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR COMMENT_SEQ= PARENTKEY
